template.name: gc-plot
template.value:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np
x = np.linspace(start=$START$, stop=$STOP$, num=$NUM_SAMPLES$)
plt.plot(x, $FUNC_OF_X$, '-') plt.plot(x, $FUNC2_OF_X$, '--') plt.show()
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np
plt.style.use('seaborn-whitegrid')
fig = plt.figure() ax = plt.axes() x = np.linspace(start=$START$, stop=$STOP$, num=$NUM_SAMPLES$)
plt.xlabel("x") plt.ylabel("sin(x)") plt.plot(x, $FUNC_OF_X$, color='$COLOR1$', linestyle='$LINE_STYLE1$', label='$LABEL1$') plt.plot(x, $FUNC2_OF_X$, color='$COLOR2$', linestyle='$LINE_STYLE2$', label='$LABEL2$') plt.title("$TITLE$") plt.xlim(10, 0) plt.ylim(1.8, -1.8) plt.show()
